top_description: Welcome to my project log, showcasing my latest development projects, milestones or blockers.

projects.title: Simple Project log
projects.description: This project is designed to automatically generate an HTML page from a `projects.json` file every time a push is made to the repository. The HTML page displays a list of projects, each with its title, description, date, tags, and images. This process is automated using GitHub Actions, which runs the PHP script (`generate.php`) to generate the HTML file. You can also run it locally and put the generate html file in a server.
projects.notes: Needs some improvements and maybe a bit of a reorganization. Add a  status to projects (mvp, blocked, live, close, ...). Some things in folders, page generated in a different folder, minify+css compiling via actions too. Some ux improvements for tags selection
